channel.title: CVE Feed for Snow Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Snow Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1150|2024-08-01T18:26:30.515Z -- snow%20software -- inventory%20agent
item.description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in Snow Software Inventory Agent on Unix allows File Manipulation through Snow Update Packages.This issue affects Inventory Agent: through 7.3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-1149|2024-08-01T18:26:30.511Z -- snow%20software -- inventory%20agent
item.description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in Snow Software Inventory Agent on MacOS, Snow Software Inventory Agent on Windows, Snow Software Inventory Agent on Linux allows File Manipulation through Snow Update Packages.This issue affects Inventory Agent: through 6.12.0; Inventory Agent: through 6.14.5; Inventory Agent: through 6.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-7169|2024-02-08T12:59:40.731Z -- snow%20software -- snow%20inventory%20agent
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in Snow Software Snow Inventory Agent on Windows allows Signature Spoof.This issue affects Snow Inventory Agent: through 6.14.5. Customers advised to upgrade to version 7.0

item.title: CVE-2024-1150|2024-06-04T18:01:07.970Z -- snow%20software -- inventory%20agent
item.description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in Snow Software Inventory Agent on Unix allows File Manipulation through Snow Update Packages.This issue affects Inventory Agent: through 7.3.1.

item.description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in Snow Software Inventory Agent on MacOS, Snow Software Inventory Agent on Windows, Snow Software Inventory Agent on Linux allows File Manipulation through Snow Update Packages.This issue affects Inventory Agent: through 6.12.0; Inventory Agent: through 6.14.5; Inventory Agent: through 6.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-7169|2024-07-05T17:20:45.622Z -- snow%20software -- snow%20inventory%20agent
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in Snow Software Snow Inventory Agent on Windows allows Signature Spoof.This issue affects Snow Inventory Agent: through 6.14.5. Customers advised to upgrade to version 7.0
